<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Ui To Code"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/vision/ui-to-code"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate React code from image or text description.

**Image mode (preferred):**
Upload a screenshot, mockup, or design image.
Kimi K2.5 will analyze it and generate matching React code.

**Text mode (fallback):**
Describe the UI you want in words.

Example (image):
```json
{
    "image_url": "https://example.com/design.png",
    "context": "Dark mode dashboard for SaaS"
}
```

Example (text):
```json
{
    "description": "Pricing table with 3 tiers, monthly/yearly toggle",
    "components_hint": ["Card", "Switch", "Badge"]
}
```

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
